Class Door

  • java.lang.Object
    • Door

  • public class Door
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Door stores the information about one of the door: does it have the prize behind it? Is it open or closed? Was it selected by the player? It provides other objects access to these information through some setters and getters.
    Author:
    gvj (gvj@eecs.uottawa.ca)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Door(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an instance of the Door object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void choose()
      Sets this door as selected by the player.
      java.lang.String getName() 
      boolean hasPrize()
      Checks if the door has the prize.
      boolean isChosen()
      Checks if the door is selected by the player.
      boolean isOpen()
      Checks if the door is open.
      void open()
      Sets this door open.
      void reset()
      Resets the door to its initial state: closed, without a prize behind it and not chosen by the player.
      void setPrize()
      Puts the prize behind this door.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Door

        public Door(java.lang.String name)
        Creates an instance of the Door object. Initially, the door is closed, doesn't have a prize behind it and has not been chosen by the player.
        Parameters:
        name - identifier for that door

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the door to its initial state: closed, without a prize behind it and not chosen by the player.

      • open

        public void open()
        Sets this door open.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the door is open.
        Returns:
        true if the door is open

      • setPrize

        public void setPrize()
        Puts the prize behind this door.

      • hasPrize

        public boolean hasPrize()
        Checks if the door has the prize.
        Returns:
        true if the door has the prize

      • choose

        public void choose()
        Sets this door as selected by the player.

      • isChosen

        public boolean isChosen()
        Checks if the door is selected by the player.
        Returns:
        true if the door is selected by the player

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the door's identifier
